title: Problema
body:
Quando clicco avvia per attivare league of legend mi arriva un finestrina con un amumu triste in cui mi segnala:PvP.net FATAL ERROR (titolo finestra)e dentro alla finestra c'è scritto: 0001: Failed loading mod/win/ClientWindow.dat due to invalid dependencies: 
lib.external.test.flex.4.runners.flexunit-cilistener-4

replies.body:
FALCOH
http://lmgtfy.com/?q=pvp.net+fatal+error+0001

[Windows OS]
Please try the the following steps to resolve this issue: 

Open Windows Explorer or Go to My Computer.
Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\[latest version]\deploy\mod (if you installed League of Legends outside of the default location, this will be located elsewhere)
Delete the rds folder.
Launch League of Legends.
